SELECT * FROM (WITH "information_periods_\d+_1_\w+" AS MATERIALIZED (SELECT * FROM (SELECT "patient_id" AS "person_id", "id" AS "criterion_id", CAST('information_periods' AS text) AS "criterion_table", CAST('observation_period' AS text) AS "criterion_domain", "start_date", "end_date", CAST(NULL AS text) AS "source_value", CAST(NULL AS text) AS "source_vocabulary_id" FROM "information_periods") AS "t1") SELECT * FROM "information_periods_\d+_1_\w+") AS "t1"
